{"text": "Nick Bounty is a junior detective with big ambitions. Out one day working another mundane case, an opportunity presents itself that he believes will help him to be a fully-fledged detective. Soon a murder manifests, and he dives headfirst into the investigation to prove his worth as an investigator. As the situation heats up, the need for an assistant becomes clear. Interviewing prospective understudies, you will need to choose one that you believe will be the most helpful to your success. With a brand new state-of-the-art crime lab at his disposal, he will be able to collect a lot more data from the clues that are discovered. With an unusual cast of characters to interview as you work your way around the city gathering evidence, a riveting story unfolds as you play.  Are you ready to step into the shoes of Nick Bounty and solve the case of the Dame with the Blue Chewed Shoe. Released & self-published on March 31, 2020, by the developer Pinhead Games, it is tagged Adventure, Noir, Casual; I have added no additional tags. It features an innovative black and white graphic style in 3D, accompanied by a well-done audio system. Superb voice-acting is done in the traditional noir narration; the characters were matched with their voice actors nicely, and I totally enjoyed every one of them. The evidence-analyzing system is a noteworthy addition and a lot of fun to figure out. With tons of humor packed within, you are sure to be having a laugh-fest as you play. Partial controller support is also included. Nick’s unusual humor and love of puns had us roaring and going just “WOW” so many times as I played through (my wife watched as I played). It’s full of hilarious one-liners and puns, which, along with its imaginative story, keeps you locked to your seat. I simply loved the way the dynamics in the title are set up for a unique experience in the genre. It is a casual title with pretty straight forward gameplay; I think I only had one area that made me think a lot to figure out how to progress. I want to play through again and see how it affects the game with a different understudy for my investigation. I didn’t see the ending coming until it was almost over.  I did have just a couple of minor issues with the title: pathing would often get stuck on objects in the scenes (if you click an interactable item and do not have a straight path to it, your model will get stuck on items between you and it), and tasking out of the game would default to a lower resolution; we were no longer able to see our inventory, resulting in needing to save and restart the game to change the resolution back to the proper state (there was one time I could not even interact with the escape key to save after I tasked back in, and I lost a couple of levels of gameplay because I had to force close without saving). This did cost a point in my scoring. Nick Bounty and the Dame with the Blue Chewed Shoe: A Fascinating Noir Adventure with a lot of Heart & Humor. 8/10 Pro's + Memorable Story + Impressive 3D Graphics + Excellent Voice Acting + Partial Controller Support Con's  - A Little Short  - No Steam Trading Cards (at this time) - No Steam Achievements (at this time) Key provided by the developer/publisher for review purposes. {"text": "Blasphemous - достаточно неплохой 2D платформер, который сочетает малую часть игровых механик олдовых/современных игр таких: Blades of Vengeance, Dark Souls и т.п.  Сюжет игры повествует о бравом воине Кающийся, который попал под проклятие бесконечного цикла смерти и  возрождения именуемый народом земли Квстодии - Чудом, теперь главному герою предстоит разорвать этот порочный круг в этом набожном мире, пропитанным извращенной религии и атмосферой Dante's Inferno.  Геймплей игры прост, где предстоит бегать по нелинейным локациям напичканные секретами и ордами разных чудищ, попутно находить/собирая склянки желчи (аналог эстуса), различные артефакты, которые дают определенные эффекты защиты от урона или устойчивость к разным стихиям магии, поэтому нужно подстраиваться под разный тип врагов и локациям, так как они содержат ловушки и опасные препятствия. За убитых врагов будут начислять \"слезы искупления\" это местная валюта (аналог душ) для прокачки меча и дополнительных комбо, покупки дорогих артефактов или ключей от секретных локаций, так же за \"слезы\" можно восстановить полоску рвения, она же позволит использовать различную магию, ну и не забываем про алтари (аналог костров). {"text": "5/5 IGN", "appid": "440", "steamid": "profiles/76561198071869148", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "1", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1424952000.0}
{"text": "(Currently nominated for both US and European IndieCade, and has a Steam rating of 98% with 66 reviews.) Imagine a world so dangerous that just being outside will kill you almost instantly, yet the elite still have all they want or need. But you, and some others want escape so badly, you’ll risk anything.  You find yourself seated at the totally unknown controls of an unfamiliar crawler-type craft. And the tasks to accomplish your escape? Entirely a mystery, just like the craft itself. So you start pushing buttons and grabbing levers…..and you die. Repeatedly. But just maybe, with a great deal of luck and some amount of logic, (and the rare contact from outside) you eventually manage to start the most critical equipment for an unknown destination with only the vaguest purpose. Beyond, of course, avoiding running out of power while surrounded by death. And causing the cover to lift on the last button you will ever push….. At which point your replacement takes your place in the next such craft, perhaps with a little more information (but likely not. And what I've just described all happens within the first minute of Nauticrawl.) Nauticrawl is most assuredly NOT my typical type of game. I don’t like failure and dying repeatedly, even in a game. But I do like mystery and logic and making progress slowly but surely. And this game is brilliant at that. How the developers managed to walk that razor line between keeping a gamer's interest, and failure happening just one time too many is remarkable. But learning based on failure has definite rewards, and Nauticrawl offers them in abundance. And even once you learn how to operate the craft, you still have to figure how to maximize its abilities for the very challenging objectives ahead. And what Nauticrawl also offers in abundance is mood. Playing in a dark room, knowing one missed critical warning might undo hours of effort makes for some very good gaming. How good? The first time I heard fuel leaking after receiving damage, I got up to see if a water bottle had gotten knocked over by my pup (and co-pilot), Chiquita. And in another game a beeping continued for an extended time, even after I exited. My surge protector was alarming, and it never occurred to me it wasn’t part of the game. I don’t want to ruin anything, but as soon as you think you have it all figured out (but are wondering about those still unused levers and buttons), suddenly you’ll find yourself in some aspect of the game that seems about as unconnected to the game you’ve been playing as possible. And then you have to start learning all over again….. Nauticrawl isn’t a cheap game, and if some players actually finished in two hours (which I tend to question, but not doubt) it may seem unjustifiably expensive. But this gamer wanted to experience as much mood and excitement as I could get, and I spent 21 exciting hours doing so. (Yet there was still plenty that I failed to complete.) I suspect many gamers won’t enjoy a game that can move at such a glacial pace (as feels very realistic considering the level of caution required by so many interconnected mysteries and unknowns.) But it isn’t all slow, and for those enjoying such games, this is about as good (and as intense) as I can imagine. Thank you for reading.", "appid": "922100", "steamid": "profiles/76561198140299850", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "34", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1569672000.0}

ภายในเกมส์จะเล่าเรื่องของตัวละครเอกตั้งแต่วัยเด็กที่มีชีวิตอันขมขื่นที่ถูกเพื่อนรังแก อาศัยอยู่ในห้องทดลองจนไม่ได้ออกสู่โลกภายนอก จนถึงวัยรุ่นตอนปลายที่มีโอกาสร่วมงานกับหน่วยพิเศษ CIA เกมส์ Beyond: Two Souls มีจุดเด่นให้ผู้เล่นตัดสินใจจากการกระทำของตัวละคร ซึ่งส่งผลกับสถานการณ์ที่จะเกิดขึ้น เกมส์มีตัวเลือกขณะเล่นค่อนข้างเยอะ ทำให้ผู้เล่นมีส่วนร่วมในการสร้างเนื้อเรื่องเกมส์จนถึงจบเกมส์ว่าตัวละครเอกจะไปในทิศทางใดและจะจบลงอย่างไร นอกจากนี้ ผู้เล่นสามารถกระทำกับวัตถุต่างๆในการผ่านด่าน รวมถึง Aiden วิญญาณอีกดวงที่ผูกกับตัวเอกถึงความสามารถเหนือธรรมชาติที่มุ่งเน้นช่วยเหลือและปกป้อง Jodie ไม่ว่าจะเป็น ส่งพลังงานกระทบหรือทำลายต่อวัตถุ, เข้าสิงร่างมนุษย์ รวมถึงเชื่อมต่อระหว่างจิตของมนุษย์ เป็นต้น อย่างไรก็ตาม แม้ว่ามุมกล้องจะพยายามบ่งบอกกลายๆว่าสิ่งที่ผู้เล่นต้องทำคืออะไร แต่บางฉากกลับไม่ได้บอกใบ้อะไร ทำให้รู้สึกงุนงงเพียงเล็กน้อย แถมเกมส์นี้ยังต้องเก็บรายละเอียดของตัวเอกในการผ่านด่านเล็กๆน้อยๆด้วย ด้านกราฟิกเกมส์ Beyond: Two Souls ถือว่าสวยงามเสมือนจริง โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่ง ใบหน้าของตัวละครเกมส์ที่ถอดหน้าราวกับมนุษย์ กับการทำอนิเมชั่นเคลื่อนไหว แถมได้นักแสดงดังอย่าง Ellen Page กับ Willem Dafoe ที่แสดงถึงอารมณ์การแสดงอย่างดีเยี่ยม มีการออกแบบฉากเกมส์ที่ตรึงใจและเป็นที่จดจำ ส่วน AI เกมส์ถือว่าธรรมดา สามารถผ่านด่านไปได้ง่าย มีเพียงแค่กดปุ่มที่หน้าจอกำหนดขึ้น ข้อดี •การเล่าเรื่องที่มีประสิทธิภาพ •ทางเลือกที่สำคัญที่มีความสำคัญ •กราฟิกที่สวยงาม และสมจริงในทุกๆ รายละเอียด •ตัวละครในเกมส์สื่ออารมณ์ออกมาได้ดี ข้อเสีย •การควบคุมที่จำกัด •ความสัมพันธ์ระหว่างตัวละครมีน้อย สำหรับ Beyond Two Souls อาจจะไม่ได้โดดเด่นเรื่องเกมเพลย์ แต่การนำเสนอนั้นถือว่าสุดยอดเพราะสามารถนำ {"text": "Hikayemize şöyle kısaca bir giriş yaparsak oyun, su altında toprak yüzeyinin meteor çarpışmaları tarafından tahrip edildiği PATHOS-2 adı verilen bir araştırma tesisinde başlıyor. Simon Jarret adlı yönlendirdiğimiz karakterimiz ise bir makinenin yaptığı beyin dalgası sonucunda PATHOS-2’de kendisini bulur. Ve tesiste, makineler ve kendini insan zanneden makineler vardır. Ne kadar ilginç değil mi? Bu makineler hakkında pek fazla detaya girmeyeceğim. Yoksa oyunda karşılaşacağınız sürprizlerden mahrum kalırsınız. :) Her Frictional Games oyununda olduğu gibi SOMA’da da çevre ile etkileşim had safhalarda. Neredeyse gördüğünüz hemen hemen her şeyi alabildiğiniz gibi fırlatıp, inceleyebiliyorsunuz. Amnesia’ya göre yapımda oynanış bakımında bazı değişikler yapılmış. Mesela SOMA’da Amnesia’daki gibi detaylı bir envanteriniz bulunmuyor. Sadece belirtilen tuşa bastığınızda, elinizde nelerin var olduğunu basit bir şekilde gösteriyor. Tabii, envanterin böyle bir değişime uğraması, oyunun bulmaca sistemine de yansıyor. Bulmacalar, Penumbra ve Amnesia’ya nazaran daha kolay. Genellikle bir kapı numarası veyahut düğme arayışı içerisinde bulunuyorsunuz. Bulmacalar ise her korku oyununda önemli olduğunu varsayarsak, SOMA’nın belki de en zayıf noktası olabilir. soma-3 Bir korku oyunundaki en önemli unsur seslerdir. Oyunun ses efektleri için ayrı bir parantez açmak gerek. Atmosferin verdiği gerilimin yanı sıra, kaliteli ses efektleri de eklenince, ortaya harika bir iş çıkıyor. Özellikle seslendirmeler... Arkadaş , bu kadar leziz, bu kadar harika bir seslendirme, ben son dönemde çıkan hiçbir bağımsız yapımda (bazı AAA’lar da dahil) görmemiştim. Bir olay esnasındaki konuşmalar o kadar içten, o kadar gerçekçi aktarılmış ki, aynı heyecanı siz de direk yaşıyorsunuz. Oyunu oynarken emin olun bana hak vereceksiniz. Bu konuda geliştiricileri tebrik etmek gerek. Bu Atmosfer Bir Harika Dostum! Oyunun geçtiği mekanlar su altı bölgeleri ve tesislerdeki dar koridorlar. Özellikle oyunun atmosferini BioShock ve System Shock 2’ye benzettiğimi söyleyebilirim. Eminim, Frictional Games de o oyunlardan çok şey almıştır. 2010’dan beri yapım aşamasında olan yapım, görsel olarak günümüz standartlarına uygun bir görsellik sunuyor. Oyunu deneyim ederken göreceksiniz, su altında yürüdüğümüz bölümler gerçekten muhteşem ötesi. Detay üzerine detay var. Cidden, bir an orada olduğunuzu hissediyorsunuz. Su altında gezerken kendi kendime ‘’Vay be, helal olsun sana Frictional Games!’’ diye haykırdım. Evet, yaptım bunu. :) Şimdi gelelim en önemli kısmımıza... Korku unsuru. Frictional Games, bağımsız bir firma olarak Amnesia The Dark Descent ile birlikte yeni bir akım başlatmıştı. Peki SOMA devamını getirebildi mi? Bu sorunun cevabı ne evet, ne de hayır diyebilirim. Öncelikle SOMA, oyuncuya hiçbir şekilde ucuz jumpscare (anlık korku) sunmuyor. Attığınız her adımda size gelen bir tehlike sinyali var. Yapmanız gereken tek şey önünüze çıkan yaratıklarla yüz yüze gelmeden kaçıp, saklanmak. Yeter ki, kapalı mekanlarda çok fazla koşup, ses çıkarmayın. Yaratık modellemeleri ise robotlardan oluşuyor. Bazıları insanımsı, bazıları ise direk makine ki, insanımsı olanının hiç affı yok. Onu ilk gördüğünüz anda tüyleriniz diken diken olabilir. Doğrusunu söylemek gerekirse, oyunda korktuğum yerler elbette oldu, ama Amnesia’daki gibi dehşette düşmediğimi söylemeliyim. Amnesia’ya göre gerilim dozu korku unsurundan daha yüksek. Ama yine de bazı yerlerde korkacaksınız ve çoğunlukla gerim gerim gerileceksiniz. soma-2 Yapımın belki de en kuvvetli yönü hikayesi. Oyunda sürekli ilerlediğinizde kendinize \"Acaba bu sefer ne olacak?\" deyip, oyunu bırakamıyorsunuz bile. Hikayenin tamamlayıcı noktaları ise oyunda bulacağınız ses kayıtları , kağıtlar ve defterler diyebilirim. Karakterler ve hikaye örgüsü çok orjinal ve siz oynarken ilgi çekiciğini hiçbir şekilde kaybetmiyor. Bu arada karakterler demişken, Frictional Games oyunlarında ilk defa bu oyunla birlikte karakterler modellemelerini oyun içinde görebiliyoruz. Evet, Penumbra oyunlarını ve Amnesia’yı oynayanlar bilirler, oyun içinde karakter modellemeleri yerine sesleri kullanılıyordu. tabii, firma uzun yıllar sonra kendini geliştirdi. Saygı duymamız gerek. :) 4 yıllık bir yapım süreci sonucunda, hayatta kalma-korku temasını kendisine benimsemiş bir oyun olarak karşımıza çıkan SOMA'nın, bu türe yakın olanların (olmayanlar bile sırf hikayesi için alabilir) kesinlikle deneyim edilmesi gereken bir bilim kurgu oyunu olduğunu rahatlıkla söyleyebilirim. Harika atmosferi, sunduğu gerilim unsuru ve fevkalade hikaye anlatımıyla başımızın tacı olan SOMA’yı alın, oynayın oynattırın. Teşekkürler Frictional Games! Bu arada oyunu bitirdiğinizde, ekranda bir kod göreceksiniz. Bu kod, oyunu yüklediğiniz klasörün içerisinde yer alan ‘’_supersecret.rar’’ dosyasının şifresidir. Ona da bakmayı unutmayın. {"text": "This is my favorite game. I used to play it on Xbox 360 a lot a couple years back. I picked it back up recently on the PC. I noticed that the framerate was unstable, but there is an easy fix to lock it at 30 fps so it's not a problem. Yes. You cannot go above that, but if you can get past the 30 fps, this is a highly enjoyable game. It is quite intriguing and throws in many different forms of gameplay for everyone. Each case acts as a new story in one big story. The music is great and getting to explore the city of L.A. in the 1940's is a treat. The game handles well and the graphics still are quite servicable to this day. The faces can look a bit funny sometimes, but that is of no matter. The game uses its motion capture to the best of its abilities and is a great game mechanic to go off. There are secrets here for anyone willing to dig deeper into this game. On a side note, this is quite a long game. On 360, the game had three discs and it took me a long while to beat it. Be ready to invest some of your free time in this game. {"text": "A great, classic RPG game. A beautiful spiritual successor to another great series Gothic. Very challenging and fun. I have spent 28 hours only on the path of a mage. The only complaint is that there are 3 \"different\" character development paths but ultimately you can still use all the same spells and skills. You can join one of the three \"guilds\": you can be a mage at the monastery, you can be a warrior of the order and you can be a warrior for the Don. The two latter I still have to do. {"text": "I hope this is not the final nail in the coffin for Torn Banner, because we don't have a bad game here. The first-person combat system which is in Chivalry is also in Mirage. {"text": "AOM a mixed bag. The game is packed with good, bad and mediocre.  Sadly there are a lot of missteps but also a lot of skill and experience put into this game. Overall, I enjoy the game. It is a chore to play at times, but most of the time it's a pleasure that's worth experiencing. Eventually you will have over a dozen heroes you can pick from to put into your 3 person active squad. Each character has different strengths, and you will want a balanced team that has a hacker, shield breaker and skin piercer. And typically one of those should have some nice mobility with triple jump + air dash. You will swap between heroes regularly, sometimes every few seconds. That is one of the fun elements of this game, picking the best person for the job! There are some super awesome characters, like Daisy, which I can relate to more than I probably should. And there are other unmentionable characters that should have never made it into a modern product. (ie overdone cliche characters from the 80s that really distract from the experience).  There is a chance you may not like the initial set of 3 heroes the game starts you with. However you quickly get more characters to choose from and can ingore the opening minutes and characters completely. There are more choices that appear very soon. There are visually repetitive stages, but there is also a pleasantly appealing yet small overworld map of Seoul. There are humorous moments but there are also uninspired \"dungeons\" and crummy animated sequences. Most of the villians aren't that engaging. There are funny and memorable missions, and then there are lots of missions that feel like a chore. The gunplay is solid, and the variations in character skills and mobility is good. Its fun to explore the overworld map to find collectibles to gear up your squad. Jumping around with a ninja slasher is fulfilling, but smoking fools with a heavy mini-gun is also satisfying. I don't really fault the overall gameplay much. But the lack of really good villians, lifeless overworld (though it looks nice) and many meh missions hold this franchise back.  I only hope that there is a sequel. That improves on the issues with this game. I would be willing to revisit without a doubt. But for now I will say I am glad I gave this game a chance, but am bittersweet to the overall experience.", "appid": "304530", "steamid": "profiles/76561197970257583", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "1", "votes_funny": "1", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1510315200.0}

{"text": "Uh Not too sure what to write here so here's a recipe for Pancakes instead Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour 3 tablespoons sugar 1 tablespoon baking powder 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg 2 large eggs, at room temperature 1 1/4 cups milk, at room temperature 1/2 teaspoon pure vanilla extract 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, plus more as needed Now to make it 1. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg. 2. In another bowl, beat the eggs and then whisk in the milk and vanilla. 3. Melt the butter in a large cast iron skillet or griddle over medium heat. 4. Whisk the butter into the milk mixture. Add the wet ingredients to the flour mixture, and whisk until a thick batter is just formed 5. Keeping the skillet at medium heat, ladle about 1/4 cup of the batter onto the skillet, to make a pancake. Make 1 or 2 more pancakes, taking care to keep them evenly spaced apart. Cook, until bubbles break the surface of the pancakes, and the undersides are golden brown, about 2 minutes. Flip with a spatula and cook about 1 minute more on the second side. Serve immediately or transfer to a platter and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Repeat with the remaining batter, adding more butter to the skillet as needed. 6. Procedure for adding fruit to pancakes: Once the bubbles break the surface of the pancakes, scatter the surface with sliced or diced fruit, or chocolate chips, nuts, etc. Flip with a spatula and cook for 1 minute more, being careful not to burn toppings.", "appid": "570", "steamid": "profiles/76561198144196630", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 0, "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1461412800.0}

{"text": "The game is fun", "appid": "730", "steamid": "profiles/76561198314295032", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "1", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1471694400.0}
{"text": "You (a random guy) wake up from a cryogenic sleep chamber, and have no recollection of anything. Not even who you are. Your goal is to make it to \"The Glow\" or Detroit Mega City as you may learn to call it both. Your goal is to make it here, exploring along the way, better equipping yourself with the task of finding out who you are.  This is how I would imagine a post-apocalyptic Detroit happening. Constantly being bombarded by the ruthless Dogmen, and Bad Muthas, a Detroit street gang of brutal, thuggish cannibals who will NOT hesitate to attack you on sight. Also strangers and looters equipped with scoped hunting rifles, and Detroit Mega City Guards with rifles, shotguns, and full SWAT-type gear ready to exterminate you. You will be excited as ever to just find a pair of old plastic shopping bags and a shard of glass or a broken bottle to arm yourself with. Every little space in your inventory counts, so space management is almost as important to your survival as dealing with combat scenarios with a cool, calm, level head. You will need to scavenge for loot while maintaining low visibility, otherwise if you think you're tough enough you can brazenly move into an abandoned building, scavenge it loudly and roughly, and hope someone or something doesn't hear or see you.  The choices you make for every little situation in this game need to be approached with clear thinking, and taking into account repercussions of your actions is seriously encouraged for this experience. You will have random encounters within the story line and others along your travels. You may succomb to diseases from exposure to sick people, bad weather (hypothermia and pneumonia), food poisoning, and even BREATHING toxic fumes over time. You will wake up to people stealing your supplies and food or attempting to bash your skull in with a stone. Then be forced to make the decision to flee in complete terror, sneak up on the thief in the dark and take them by surprise, or just stand up from your sleep and attack them in a raging fury. If you can get past the clunky UI and lack of animation or intimate graphical control, this game is a dirty gem just waiting to be appreciated by the next \"arachaeologist\" who finds it. I never pictured myself enjoying a game that's 60% text-based, but I quickly fell in love with this game. Here, you can learn quickly from past mistakes and keep pushing forward. If you ever thought it was hard to survive in other \"survival\" games, this is   more unforgiving but also more rewarding to experience. True-to-life combat system that allows your simplest mistakes to be exploted by your enemy, possibly resulting in your death or serious injury. 9.5/10 Even if you hate text-based games, or games with hexes (I certainly did), you may find yourself immersed and deeply invested into this game. I   recommend this for anyone who appreciates post-apocalyptic roleplaying games and/or heavy survival. Even at full retail price this is a worthwhile purchase. The game has a few flaws, but all are so minor and outweighed greatly by what   there is in the game that you quickly forget they exist or have trouble noticing them to begin with. Very reminiscent of the first game of the Fallout series, more so than the second, but this game has its own unique flavour.", "appid": "248860", "steamid": "profiles/76561197968103909", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "8", "votes_funny": "1", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1420372800.0}

{"text": "A quick rundown of my thoughts followed by a more explained review on the bottom. Important note is that, although my hours on records shows as 6 hours, I have played this game for more than 50 hours thanks to their Mobile port, which unfortunately does not count hours on Steam.   ===[ Age: ]===  ☐ Kids ✓ Everyone ☐ Casual players ☐ Pro players ===[ Graphics: ]===  ☐ Potato ☐ Bad ☐ OK ☐ Good  ✓ Beautiful  ===[ Price/quality: ]===  ✓ Full price ☐ Wait for sale ☐ Average ☐ Not recommended ===[ Requirements: ]===  ☐ Minimum ✓ Medium  ☐ Fast ☐ High end  ===[ Difficulty: ]===  ☐ Relaxed ✓ Easy to learn / Hard to master  ☐ Difficult ☐ A Nightmare ===[ Game time/length ]===  ☐ Really short ( 0 - 2 hours) ☐ Short ( 2 - 8 hours) ☐ Moderate ( 8 - 12 hours) ☐ Long ( 12+ hours) ✓ Endless ===[ Story] ===  ☐ Doesn’t have ☐ Average ☐ Good ✓ Fantastic ===[ Soundtrack] ===  ☐ Doesn’t have ☐ Average ☐ Good ✓ Fantastic ===[ Bugs ]===  ☐ Bugs destroying the game ☐ Lot of bugs ☐ Few Bugs ☐ You can use them for speed run ✓ None  ===[ Others: ]===  Multiplayer: No Singleplayer: Yes ===[ Reviewh: ]===  80 Days is a fantastic and beautiful game inspired by   by Jules Verne.   First with the pros of the game. There are a variety of ways to play this game due to the length, route, and method of travel used. First is length, you can choose to go around the world as fast as you possibly can, speeding through each location like the madmad that Fogg's wagers can be! Or perhaps you would prefer to take a more relaxed and slower pace, disregarding the 80 day goal. Either way, the choice is up to the player and a variety of options are provided to get both playstyles done.  Routes are not limited to the locations that are present in the book, instead you can visit virtually the entire world, should you choose to do so. Some parts of the map   get a little weird to some people as it is not entirely modern, but instead is the world based on the time period as written in the book.   My personal favorite thing about the game, as it also increases replayability, is the challenge of visiting every single city before heading back to london. This, on paper, sounds easy, but due to limited methods of travel to and from each location, it is not as easy to turn back around. The soundtrack is fantastic throughout the gameplay and compliments the artstyle perfectly, along with the change of tunes presented when one runs into trouble during their travels.  Gameplay is extremely simple, but like I mentioned, can be extremely difficult to master if trying to achieve certain \"challenges\". One should also note that there is an RNG factor in the game that determines what is available in the store of X city, each run. Causing for it to have a different pace everytime you start the game, along with random occurances alongside scripted occurances depending on your choice of action, route, statement, etc.  As for the cons of the game, there are very few. One primarily being, despite the minimum hardware requirements, the game lags visibly on my high end macbook pro. I am unsure if this is a bug within the game, or if it just happens to be not as well optimized for mac, but it does struggle and lag fairly badly on my macbook while it runs flawlessly on my mobile android phone and PC. Overall, this game provides fantastic art, music, story, and most importantly replayability. No two runs of the game is exactly the same and the variety of routes provided brings a fresh change of pace to each run. I very highly recommend this game to be purchased at the full price, it is worth it.", "appid": "381780", "steamid": "profiles/76561198043781049", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "9", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1530792000.0}

{"text": "This game came out on consoles all the way back in 2011, which is hard to believe when playing through the campaign in 2020. It still looks great for the most part with only a few textures here and there that could be sharper. Crysis 2 comes from a time when single player campaigns in shooters tended to be longer and this one could have actually benefited from being edited down a bit. It's a cool game for sure with enjoyable gameplay, some well designed, big open spaces and entertaining set pieces. It's just that there are also some kinda boring and repetitive sections. If they had cut out some of the repetition and shortened the campaign slightly it would have helped the overall experience. The game is way too easy on the normal difficulty but if you choose to challenge yourself by playing on hard mode, things get much more interesting. As you'll be forced to play more strategically by using more stealth and choosing the right weapon for dealing with the right kind of enemy. There are collectables available here too and an extreme difficulty that I tried out for a little bit. However I'm reluctant to play through the whole campaign again because of the length. This is mitigated a bit however by a well designed main menu which allows you to replay specific levels and doing this on the hardest difficulty is actually a lot of fun. There is even a 100% counter in the main menu for completing everything which is nice. However I read online that this is glitched because of one missing collectible resulting in a limit of 98% or something. I think this is because the multiplayer no longer works and it was the only way to find this specific thing. The science fiction aspect to the story is pretty awesome and the developers really tried to add plenty of character to the main protagonist. However there is also alot of military style content in this game which at times feels too much like a poor man's Call of Duty. Some of this boring military stuff should also have been cut from the campaign or at least been made a bit less serious. Anyway there are alot of awesome moments here too and I found that the campaign improves a lot in the later levels. While I also noticed some influences here from other classic games and characters such as Half Life 2 and Batman. Overall I had a lot of fun playing through this campaign in 2020 as it's still a mostly well designed and kick ass shooter especially when played on the harder difficulties.", "appid": "108800", "steamid": "profiles/76561198074661529", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "15", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1588420800.0}

{"text": "I love this game! I used to play the old Tomb Raider games for Playstation way back when, and while I liked them okay I always thought they were really hard. But I grabbed it for five bucks on the last day of the Steam Summer Sale and I'm so glad I did! This is one of my favorite games I've played in a really long time. The graphics are really great, and this is one of few games in which I've continually felt compelled to take screenshots all throughout the game. I love the combat system and the gameplay. Also, while some people I've heard aren't fans of the quick time events, I absolutely love them and think they are really fun. It took me about 16 hours to play through this game, but I only did 13 of the achievements. There's still a bunch of content for me to go back and explore before I complete the game, which is really nice. I'm looking forward to going back for things I missed. Some of the puzzles were a bit challenging, but overall it's a very easy but super fun game to play. The story was really interesting and actually hooked me in nicely. {"text": "MAFIA 2 is an all-time classic and one of my favorite games to date. I finished Mafia II (Classic) twice in the past on my old PC. And as devs very generously granted me a free copy of Definitive Edition, I couldn't wait to play it again on my new system and as of right now I'm on chapter 15, specifically going for \"Ladies Man\" achievement.   To be very honest, this is a very well made reshade. Lighting, textures, reflections represent the technological advancement we saw since the release of the original. I don't have any negative remarks, except the game could be a bit more optimized in PhysX section and a few very weird bugs.   Ultra preset PhysX can cause framedrops in very intense gunfight situations in open roads on entry level PCs (Ryzen 1200, 1050Ti, 8GB ram, 10Gb pagefile set on SSD in my case) and I've had a few hiccups while driving under the streetlights inside the tunnels.   Bugs include texture glitches, character animations etc. The launcher in particular is awful, should NOT have included that, and I had to relocate my Documents folder just to be able to autosave, because the game glitched. All in all, I'm satisfied with this. Nothing more can be said about story. Linear but deep story about friendship and loss. Voice acting is great, accents really shine on Italian characters. {"text": "Creo que nunca me ha sido tan difícil reseñar un juego. No sé qué palabras usar. Para empezar diré que tienes que estar muy dispuesto a leer, y cuando digo leer es leer y comprender el mundo tan detallado que han creado, que al final es una metáfora de la vida un tanto especial, hay mucha política, sexo, droga y disco jajaja Mención especial a los grandes personajes que te encontrarás durante tu aventura, sobre todo nuestro acompañante, Kim Kitsuragi, que es uno de los mejores personajes que han creado nunca para un videojuego. No hay combates, también debes tenerlo claro, habrá algún momento de acción pero todo se resolverá con textos y tiradas de dados, hablado de éstos, he leído varias quejas de que lo dejan todo muy aleatorio, yo la verdad, sin haber probado el modo Hardcore que dificulta las tiradas de dados, me ha parecido incluso muy fácil, he terminado con un montón de medicinas acumuladas, y ya os digo, si te pone que tienes un 5% de probabilidad de acertar la tirada, pues no tires los dados alma de cántaro, si no puedes de esa manera, busca otra solución a tu problema, yo lo he visto muy coherente toda la partida, he acertado una tirada con un 3% y fallado dos tiradas con un 80 y tantos% pero que dentro de las probabilidades está muy bien pues el resto, hasta muchas entre 40 y muchos% y 50 y pocos% las he acertado todas prácticamente. Al final es eso, tirar dados y que no sea a lo loco.  Para esto último aparte de tus estadísticas en las habilidades requeridas, por ejemplo imagina que necesitas percepción para subir el % de una tirada, pues sumará tu habilidad base de percepción, más lo que puedas sumar con prendas de ropa y objetos, que habrá muchas de ambas por el juego, con diferentes estadísticas y que te podrás equipar según te interese en ese momento, además que ciertas conversaciones o cosas que hayas descubierto, pueden subir las probabilidades de la tirada, imagínate por ejemplo que quieres intimidar a un tipo, pues si vas con una chupa de cuero con +2 en intimidación y encima antes lo has escuchado mintiendo sobre X a otra persona, ambas cosas te harán más fácil intimidarlo. Sobre las tiradas de dados también tengo que decir que hay dos tipos, las normales y las críticas, el juego te lo dice siempre, las normales las podrás volver a intentar si mejoras la habilidad requerida más adelante, para las críticas sólo tendrás un intento así que piensatelo bien porque si el % no es muy alto, el riesgo es mayor.  Una cosa que en principio no me gustó es que puedes guardar en todo momento y si quieres, puedes cargar y reintentar una tirada hasta que te salga, pero aparte de que es un poco, mucha trampa, recomiendo que juegues y aceptes tus decisiones y aciertos y fallos. Si fallas, busca otra forma de solucionarlo, ahí es donde descubrirás la grandeza de éste juego, pues todo está relacionado de una manera sutil pero magnífica, cada conversación que tengas, cada pequeña decisión son tiradas de dados rápidas que están influyendo en la partida.  El estilo artístico del juego, es maravilloso, parece una acuarela que cobra vida ante tus ojos. Queda simplemente genial.  Nos encontramos ante un juego que ha sabido plasmar muy bien lo que es el rol de mesa en un videojuego y lo mezcla muy bien con leer un libro. Vamos a encarnar a un detective, podrás elegir entre 3 arquetipos predeterminados, más físico, más psíquico o más intelectual o podrás hacer uno a tu gusto y repartir puntos entre las muy variopintas habilidades del juego, teniendo en cuenta que para subir unas tendrás que bajar otras, o podrás hacer un mix con todo igualado en el centro sin destacar en nada, eres libre para crear a tu detective como plazca.  Sobre las habilidades, fijaros en las pestañas que hay un resumen de lo que hacen cada una pero tienen una pestaña con info detallada de lo que hacen realmente cada una y es muy útil leerlas todas antes de decidir qué clase de detective quieres ser. Te despertarás en una habitación de un hotel, sin ropa, sin saber donde estás, ni quién eres, pronto descubrirás que eres un detective que bueno, llegó para resolver un asesinato pero se dedico a beber y drogarse hasta perder la memoria, recurso muy utilizado en los juegos de rol si, pero aquí utilizado de una forma brillante para que con un mismo personaje, puedas crear muchos diferentes según las habilidades que escojas y las decisiones que tomes, pues al no recordar ni tu nombre, ni cuestiones básicas cómo quién es el cantante de moda o donde estás, sirve de punto de partida perfecto para que lo vayas descubriendo hablando con todo el mundo y nunca desentona, pues realmente no conoces el universo que han creado y lo vais a descubrir juntos el personaje y tú.  Parece que irás descubriendo que eras un desastre y de ti depende seguir siéndolo o intentar rectificar y ser mejor persona o ser peor aún, todo es posible! Tendrás un caso principal como ya he dicho y mientras avanzas te podrán surgir casos secundarios y tú tendrás la opción de aceptarlos o seguir con el caso principal y pasar de todos. Destacar el genial sistema de ciclo día / noche que han implementado en el juego, porque le ha sentado genial, el tiempo avanza en ciertas situaciones, por ejemplo cuando hablas con gente, lees un libro, duermes, etc y la verdad que me ha resultado muy curioso y efectivo.  Ah también durante esa lucha interna que tendrás para ver que tipo de persona eras/eres también te surgirán pensamientos, que podrás desarrollar, normalmente desarrollar esos pensamientos te penalizarán mientras lo haces y después te darán unas estadísticas que te podrán ser útiles o no, una vez desbloqueados estos pensamientos, podrás decidir si quedarte con ellos u olvidarlos para siempre, eso sí, olvidarlos te costará un punto de habilidad, al igual que desbloquear nuevas ranuras para poder llevar más pensamientos. No sé cómo contar más cosas sin hacer spoilers pero os diré que no es un juego para todo el mundo, debes saber dónde te metes, es un juego muy peculiar con un sentido del humor muy socarrón y especial, las conversiones, tanto con tu mundo interior como el exterior, o con otros personajes, son lo más troll que he visto en mucho tiempo, no me quiero imaginar como ha tenido que ser la gran traducción al español que han hecho, que aprovecho para dar las gracias una vez más por su gran trabajo titanico. El final me ha sorprendido porque tomé varias decisiones que al final si han influido y me he quedado con ganas de saber qué habría pasado si lo hubiera hecho de otra manera. se ve que el juego es muy re jugable, veo difícil que 2 personas diferentes hagan la misma partida así como así con tantas opciones como hay y tantos finales como parece que puede haber. Más que finales diferentes creo que varios finales pero con muchas diferentes maneras de llegar a ellos. En mi partida por ejemplo dejé varios cabos importantes sueltos pero aún así logré descubrir a la persona culpable y terminar el juego de una forma que en principio me parece positiva.  Es difícil de explicar pero me ha tenido pegado al monitor las 30h que lo he jugado, disfrutando mientras pasaban sin casi darme cuenta, tanto que al final se me han hecho cortas. es un juego muy peculiar, con mucha carga política y sobre la vida misma. Destacar como punto negativo, el apartado sonoro que si bien tiene un par de momentos épicos, se nota que el presupuesto y los esfuerzos lo han puesto en la jugabilidad, pero es una música que acompaña muy bien aunque puede llegar a ser repetitiva por momentos, al igual que las voces, que sólo han doblado parcialmente el inicio de los personajes principales por así decirlo, pero claro para un equipo con un presupuesto tan pequeño, se entiende que doblar toda esa cantidad ingente de texto era una locura y se agradece el esfuerzo para que al menos el inicio de las conversaciones tengan unas voces para que las asimiles a cada personaje, que por cierto, menudo elenco de personajes hay en éste juego.", "appid": "632470", "steamid": "profiles/76561198012417415", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "30", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1599134400.0}

{"text": "найс", "appid": "385270", "steamid": "profiles/76561198084286505", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 0, "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": true, "tstamp_created": 1443787200.0}
{"text": "is an investigative horror about repetition and obsession. This is a Pavlovian exercise in paranormal horror where you try and document the existence of a geometrically impossible apartment without getting killed by the ghost of a dead architect. Instead of a dog getting food every time the bell rings, you get closer to document the existence of Suite 776 every time you ring the apartment bell. Every time you ring that bell, new paranormal activity changes something in the apartment. Through this repetition, Suite 776 summons an eerie atmosphere, a well-written short story, and manages to incorporate tasteful jumpscares.  You become afraid of turning every corner because you do not know what horrors lie beyond. A seemingly innocuous occurrence, like a door slowly opening, stops being explained by a sudden breeze and becomes a signal of the afterlife interacting with the living world.  In Suite 776, you have two tasks: to prove that Suite 776 exists, and to document the paranormal activity surrounding the apparent suicide of Mary. Mary is the infamous architect behind the impossible Suite 776 – an apartment in the 12th floor that has a window view of the ground floor, an apartment that has doors which lead to different rooms during different times. Suite 776 reads like a short paranormal horror story. It’s a linear story. Mary was an incredibly talented architect that slowly spiraled into an unstable psychological state. Her turmoil came from her inability to take criticism. It became so bad, she bought multiple mannequins so that she could project her anger onto them for reminding her of her failures. She became so obsessed with pride and her anger consumed her so that she committed suicide. These mannequins in turn, at later points of the game, serve as creepy apparitions as they populate the apartment out of nowhere. The gameplay is mainly comprised of walking, puzzle-solving, item collection, and note-reading. The game also does not feature save points, despite not being permadeath, and is supposed to be completed roughly under an hour.", "appid": "1197370", "steamid": "profiles/76561198024812228", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "32", "votes_funny": "1", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1579953600.0}

{"text": "CI Games (ehm. City Interactive) war nicht immer dafür bekannt gute Spiele zu machen. Ein bestes Beispiel für die schlechten Spiele von CI Games ist die Code of Honor reihe. Jedoch merkt man das sich CI Games von Jahr für Jahr verbessert. Die Sniper Ghost Warrior Reihe fand ich schon damals recht interessant, jedoch war sie nicht das Gelbe vom Ei. Der erste Teil war verbuggt wie eh und je und der zweite Teil war zu einfach und linear. Jedoch gehört SGW2 immer noch zu den Spielen, die ich gerne mal anschmeiße und spiele. Warum? Nun, ich habe selbst keine Ahnung... es fesselt mich einfach gerne mal. Mir persönlich hat die Beta sehr gefallen es gab zwei Stoy-Missionen und einen kleinen Open-World teil in denen noch weitere gegnerische Außenposten verteilt sind. Abseits von ein paar kleinen Bugs, wie das mein Auto von jetzt auf gleich verschwindet oder das ich ab und zu eine komplett andere Sniper dabei hatte die ich nie ausgerüstet habe, ist mir nicht viel aufgefallen. Auch die Performance lief auf meinem AMD-System (System seht in meinem Profil) mit 60 FPS in 1080p (1920x1080) auf Hoch. Texturen brauchen zwar beim Start etwas länger zum Laden aber sobald sie fertig geladen haben läuft alles super. Anders als bei den beiden Vorgängern bietet Sniper Ghost Warrior 3 nur noch wenig Hilfe. Sachen wie die Zielhilfe oder das automatische Zeroing fällt komplett weg (so zumindest in der Beta). Man muss nun selbst den Schuss bei Wind und Entfernung berechnen und im richtigen Moment abdrücken, was das ganze um einiges Authentischer rüber bringt als die beiden Vorgänger. Dazu kommt noch das der Schalldämpfer ähnlich wie bei Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain nach einiger Zeit aufgebraucht ist und man dank dem System eine gewisse Taktische tiefe hat. Das Fernglas der Vorgänger wurde durch eine Drohne ersetzt, welche (leider) immer noch Gegner automatisch markiert und man diese hinter Wänden noch sehen kann. Bleibt nur zu hoffen, dass man es deaktivieren kann. SGW3 hat in der Beta schon guten Eindruck hinterlassen und hat es geschafft, dass ich mir zum ersten mal ein Spiel von CI Games vorbestellt habe. Wer schon etwas länger auf der Suche nach einem etwas realistischen Sniper-Spiel ist, sollte SGW3 im Auge behalten. -Co-op Modus mit bis zu 4-6 Spieler (Multiplayer wurde schon bestätigt) -Mod-Support oder einen Mission-Editor (wie die Arma-Reihe) -Weniger Sturmgewehre dafür mehr Sniper -Einen Kletterharken wie bei dem ersten Teil (hat damals nichts gebracht würde dafür jetzt aber passen) -Interaktion mit der Open-World (z.b. Bei den Bürger nach groben Infos fragen etc...) {"text": ": DIRT 3 + DIRT RALLY = DIRT 4 : เป็นการรวมร่างกันของเกมทั้งสองแล้วออกมาค่อนข้างดีมากแม้ว่าจะมีบางจุดที่เจอแล้วจะแอบเบื่อนิดๆว่า \"เอามาทำไมหนออันนี้\" กับบางอย่างที่มันดีอยู่เเล้วแต่ก็ตัดทั้งเฉย..แต่อย่างไรก็ตามพอมารวมตัวกันแล้วมันออกมาดีมาก แม้มันจะไม่ใช่ของใหม่อะไรก็เถอะนะ  -- RALLY  -- เป็นเกมที่สนุกใช้ได้มีระบบหลากหลายและรถ \"ค่อนข้างน้อย\" โดยรวมไม่ค่อยมีอะไรน่าตื่นเต้นมากเท่าไรถ้าคุณเป็นแฟนเกม DIRT ทุกๆภาค ภาคนี้ก็คงเหมือนๆกับทุกภาคที่ผ่านมา (ผมไม่ได้บอกว่าเกมมันไม่ดีหรือดีนะชอบไม่ชอบแล้วแต่คุณแต่สำหรับผมมันใช้ได้เลยทีเดียว) ส่วนพวกรถกับแมพมันก็มาในระดับที่น่าพอใจแต่มันก็นะ...และระบบแต่งสีรถ สีทีม ชื่อทีม จ้างคนงาน ก็งั้นๆไม่ได้น่าสนใจอะไรมากไม่ได้ส่งผลกระทบอะไรต่อเกมเลยทั้งสิ้นเเค่เอามาเท่ๆเฉยๆ แต่ที่ผมชอบคือส่วนของการ \" จูนรถ \" มันมีการพัฒนาขั้นสูงสุดจากภาคที่เเล้วๆมา ปันสามารถปรับได้ละเอียดมากๆและที่ปรับไปก็ส่งผลต่อการขับขี่ชัดเจน บทพูดของ co-op driver ที่ชัดเจนขึ้นตรงจังหวะดี  มาส่วนที่เห็นการพัฒนาอย่างชัดเจนเลยคือ กราฟิก สวยกว่าภาคล่าสุดอย่าง DIRT RALLY แบบเห็นได้ชัดมากๆกับระบบ AI ที่เข้มจัดๆพลาดนิดนึงนี่แทบแพ้ราบคาบกับระบบฟิสิกส์ที่ปรับได้ว่าจะขับเอามันส์ไม่ปัด ไม่ส่าย หรือ จะสมจริงแบบสุดๆมากกว่า DIRT RALLY ที่ผ่านมาเสียอีก( สมจริงมากขนาดทำเราหัวร้อนได้ ) ... นี่ละมั้ง สิ่งที่เขาให้มาใหม่ในภาคนี้แล้วน่าสนใจจริงๆ พวกโหมด buggy หรือ rally cross จาก DIRT 3 ยังคงมาเช่นเคย ขอไปลองเล่นก่อนจะมาเขียนเพิ่มนะ อิอิ. ย้ำ*** ทั้งหมดนี้ที่กล่าวมาเป็นโหมด rally ทั้งสิ้น *** โหมดอื่นไม่ได้ลอง.. โดยรวมแล้วถ้าคุณชอบความหลากหลายสไตล์ DIRT 3 บวกกับ การขับ Rally ที่สมจริงและมันส์สะใจ การตัดสินใจที่จะซื้อเกมนี้ผมว่าคงไม่ต้องพูดอะไรกันมากมาย เพราะทีมงานเขาคัดสรรสิ่งที่ดีที่สุดจากทั้งสองเกมมารวมไว้ให้เเล้วใน : DIRT 4 :", "appid": "421020", "steamid": "profiles/76561198132693560", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "2", "votes_funny": "1", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1559822400.0}
{"text": "\"Sci-Fi Ninjas in Space\" is the common one-line description you'll see of Warframe. But it's more. It's so much more. What looks like a generic 3rd-person F2P shooter has buckets of content behind it. The game has been through massive changes since I originally wrote this review, and I felt it needed an update. You can now build your own war ship, and in coming months you'll be able to take it out of the dry-dock into space and literally attack the space pirates and other entities that plague the system. {"text": "Drake Hollows is a very cute game and a mix of various genres. As the protagonist we got teleported to another world where we need to care about the cute Drakes. It is a building sim as it is required to create some buildings for them. The game is also a resource management game as we need to feed and entertain them. Additionally, it is required to explore the world for resources, fight enemies and defend the camp from raids so Drake Hollows ...the character creation. You can be female/male and you can choose any possible color for skin, eyes, hair. ...the Drakes. They are sooo cute and they interact with every single building in some weird, cute way. They are just awesome. ...the challenging gameplay. Fighting multiple enemies during an ambush is very challenging, but if the game is not scaling up enemies when multiple players on the map then the coop could be a bit boring. ...the graphic. The game looks very nice (well, unless you like only realistic graphic game instead of the cartoony one) ...the music. The decent soundtracks have a good chemistry together with the graphic and other parts of the game so it is easy to get pulled in and forget about the time. ...that the game is available in both single player and co-op. ...that you can find many-many outfits for your character. Fortunately, this game isn’t from koei tecmo or a similar company so these are included in the game instead selling each of it as dlc on a paid game. ...the nonexistent voice acting. 30€ game and no voice acting/narration? I know, there aren’t many speaking NPCs, but there should be one for the crow, cat etc. Come on! ...that i got stuck on rocks many times. ...that some quality of life features are missing. Like filtering items based on their type when moving items from inventory to the stahs or when selling items. The other one was that there is only 1! Button for all utility items. It is very annoying to go through 8 or more items when I need the healing item during combat. ...that some hints weren't exactly clear. I had some difficulties figuring out how to connect electricity to other buildings, how to repair buildings, etc. ...that I can’t repair my weapon once it loses its durability. ...the limited amount of enemy types. There are exactly 4, and 1 boss. You can find all of them already in the first 1-2 hours, 10-12 hours later, already at the end of 2nd chapter, still no new enemy type. ...that the game starts to be repetitive after 12-14 hours. In the second chapter, the same buildings, environment, just the season are different and there are still no new enemies. I liked this game and I will continue to play it until finished. Is it worth 30$-€? Well, if you have XBOX game pass, then play it there. This game is included in that one.  Combat is ok and because of the mixing multiple genres into one game there are many things to do and all of those implement properly, without bugs or problems.  As I know there is an upcoming sandbox mode with randomized map so this will offer some replay value.  It is a bit ruined by the too many integrated genres. I would explore an island and constantly called back to defend the camp from raids or by having too low amount of food/water in camp.  Nice looking game. . Quite nice soundtracks and environmental sound effects.  Single player feels sometimes a bit too hard. If the game does not scale difficulty based on the number of players then multiplayer with 3-4 would be boring. Perfection time: ~25-35h. There are 2 MP achievements and for one you need 3 other players. That is not the challenging part tho. While 1 walkthrough is enough, getting all notes is very hard. Not just because the whole world of the campaign randomly generated, note locations are randoms, but it is hard because these notes bugged sometimes. Map shows for some island that you can find there 1 collectible, while i found there 2, some shows 3 but only 2 there so not just hard to find all, but can't even believe to the map. The other achievements are easy during a regular, nonspeedrun playthrough. I also made a guide to help to get them all easily:", "appid": "739650", "steamid": "profiles/76561198048659492", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "115", "votes_funny": "3", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1601553600.0}

{"text": "Если Вы любите японские хорроры не за атмосферу ужаса, а скорее за их больную эстетику, то эта игра Вам точно понравится, ведь по части безумных визуальных решений разработчики явно не испытывали дефицита начиная ещё с первой части. А вот про разнообразность геймплея такого сказать не могу. Нехватка времени и бюджета относительно современных игр с подобными амбициями виден во всём – начиная от того, что практически все противники копии друг друга с тремя видами анимации движения, и заканчивая тем, что одну и ту же локацию нужно зачищать по несколько раз. Искусственный интеллект, мягко говоря, не блещет, из-за чего прохождение на любом уровне сложности не составляет никаких проблем. Однако, не смотря на всё это, играть довольно интересно из-за большого количества видов оружия, которое нам умело преподносят практически в каждой главе. Вообще стоит отметить, что в этой игре довольно много экшна, при этом от шутера её отличает необходимость заниматься менеджментом патрон на последних уровнях сложности, что только добавляет плюс в копилку этой игры. Сюжет стал заметно понятнее чем в первой части, при этом своего японского шарма не растерял. Сценаристы довольно ловко обыграли стандартную, причём уже ставшую мемом, историю от «Bethesda» про поиск и спасение пропавшего члена семьи. С абсолютной уверенностью могу заверить, что ни разу не заскучал при прохождении, а кат-сцены так и вообще меня отдельно порадовали. {"text": "Теперь я знаю по какой новелле было сделано аниме \"Пластиковые воспоминания\".", "appid": "430960", "steamid": "profiles/76561198802987957", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "1", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1579608000.0}
{"text": "整体玩法设定也与两部前作一脉相承，比如可高度定制的武器装备，围绕探索、战斗和潜行三大能力展开的成长体系，以绳索、拉环、转轴为核心且需要活用一些简单物理学知识的谜题机关……技术经验方面的积累让这部新作的品质达到了新劳拉三部曲的巅峰。只不过这种进化最终止步于量变阶段——细节上的小修小补和风格主题的微调，并不足以让《古墓丽影：暗影》跨过质变的门槛，破茧成蝶。 游戏的主要舞台设定在拉丁美洲的秘鲁丛林。和前作相比，《古墓丽影：暗影》的地图尺寸更加庞大，也更富有人情味。以“隐秘之城”为代表的村落，既是地图关卡的枢纽核心，也是生机勃勃的观光圣地。你可以在这里和村民们聊天、交易、开启支线任务，或者仅仅只是观察村民的日常生活。水下探索部分在这部作品中也变得更充实，这不但让冒险的过程更加丰富多彩，也让劳拉的活动空间更有立体感和层次感。 作为宽线性动作冒险游戏，《古墓丽影：暗影》在把控主、支线任务节奏方面也比前作更加得心应手。一方面，由于这部作品的支线任务有着更为讲究的叙事和更明确的奖励，这些额外挑战的吸引力比《古墓丽影：崛起》明显更高。另一方面，主线故事的分量依然处于绝对优势地位，其流畅性丝毫没有因为支线挑战部分的加强而被打乱或削弱。 这部作品在谜题机关和古墓挑战方面则达到了新《古墓丽影》三部曲的最佳水平。解谜部分所占比例得到了明显提高，其在这部作品中的分量甚至不亚于探索和战斗部分。谜题机关的精巧程度和破关难度也均出现了明显提升——这无疑更加契合“古墓丽影”这个IP的内涵本色，也让游戏整体氛围变得更为厚重。 在应敌方式上，《古墓丽影：暗影》比任何一部前作都更强调潜行风格。具体来说，游戏大幅降低了正面火拼的容错率，劳拉变得非常容易死亡，而这也让潜行和暗杀在绝大多数情况下都成为了最优解。与此同时，这部作品给劳拉提供的潜行暗杀手段也更加丰富。你可以往身上摸泥，从而更好地融入环境当中；可以静悄悄地蹲在树枝上，将靠近的敌人突然悬挂上枝头；还可以在敌人尸体上设置陷阱，让附近的敌人自投罗网…… 但是另一方面，这一作的改进幅度远不如2013年的《古墓丽影》和2015年的《古墓丽影：崛起》。假如你期待着质变式的品质突破或者肉眼可见的机制创新，那么《古墓丽影：暗影》恐怕会让你失望了。 PS. 强迫症不建议游玩此游戏.会给身心造成难以磨灭的伤害. {"text": "Сыграв в это творение достаточно времени, выбив достижения, пройдя историю и открыв все локации, могу сказать, что “Eastshade” – незамысловатая игра с красивой картинкой, освещением и живописными пейзажами. По моему мнению, авторам удалось передать дух необычной жизни творческого человека. Нам предоставляется роль художника, который в память о матери должен зарисовать несколько мест на острове Ист-Шейде. Чтобы найти эти памятные места нужно довольно много ходить и  исследовать остров. Помимо рисования картин, придется выполнять квесты, заниматься крафтом и собирать ресурсы.  Звучит довольно неплохо, но уже к середине игры мотание по острову начинает надоедать и ты пользуешься быстром переходом между локациями, на которых побывал ранее. Но все же открывать новые места достаточно интересно, ведь у каждого есть душа, а также уникальные местные жители со своей историей. Однако их поручения не отличаются оригинальностью! Здешние обитатели только так и подкидывают нам новые задачки из разряда “принеси-подай”. Напрягало ли это? Безусловно. Не очень хочется возвращаться к одному и тому же персонажу на другой конец острова, чтобы передать ему пару слов и идти обратно. Порой так и возникало желание поскорее закончить игру, но к моему удивлению, концовка сменила легкий гнев на милость - я даже пустила слезу. Наш герой покидает остров и тут понимаешь, что будешь скучать, скучать по его дивным жителям, окружающим красотам и непередаваемой атмосфере.", "appid": "715560", "steamid": "profiles/76561198317974070", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "12", "votes_funny": "1", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1569240000.0}

{"text": "A turn based strategic card game, with some RPG elements. This game is not for everyone, people with a bit of patience and love for strategy games will enjoy this.  The concept of the game is simple, you have three races to choose from, with each race having it's advantages and disadvantages. Then you have three types of heroes for each race. Mage, Warrior and Healer. You get a set of cards for each of them and as you progress you get better cards. At the start of the round you are given random cards from you deck, that you can play out on the board.  The campaign keeps you entertained, you can complete the story, but you can't complete the game 100 percent unless you are willing to spend money. Online multiplayer is pretty smooth and keeps you entertained with competitive matchmaking and rare item drops.  Give this game a try once.", "appid": "293260", "steamid": "profiles/76561198016232816", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "12", "votes_funny": "1", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1465992000.0}

{"text": "Counter-Strike:Global Offensive Czy to wam się z czymś kojarzy? NO PEWNIE jest to kolejna nawalanka firmy Valve która powstała 21Sierpnia 2012. Gra CSGo jest najcześciej graną grą na steamie (Przed Dotą 2), gra jest jedną z najwiekszych gier na steamie ponieważ jest bardzo popularna i uwielbiana przez graczy ponieważ 2013 roku zostały dodane skiny które no napchały twórcom pięniedzy. Gra posiada 4 tryby rozgrywki są to: Uproszczony: czyli nawalanka na całego 7vs7 na mapie np dust 2 to jest mnóstwo ten tryb charakteryzuje się tym że jest dużo osób na jednej mapie i ogołnie ten tryb trzyma nas za rękę ponieważ automatycznie kupuje nam podstawowe rzeczy Turniejowy: to tryb w którym walczymy o rangi. Rang jest 18 od Silver 1 aż po Global Elite na jednej z kilku map walczymy 5vs5 ten kto wygra mecz dostaje specjalne punkty ELO (których nie zobaczymy sobie w grze) ten tryb jest odblokowany od 3 stopnia rangi, w tym trybie musimy pamiętać o kupywaniu Kevlaru lub defuse'a również musimy pilnować swoich teametow ponieważ jest friendly fire jak zabijemy 4 osoby z naszej drużyny dostajemy ban (kare na turniejowe) od 30min aż do nawet 7dni Wyścig zbrojeń:To tryb w którym każdy zaczyna z jedną z broni i gdy zabijemy 2 przeciwników my dostajemy kolejną broń  ta osoba która zdobędzie \"Złoty nóz\" i zabije z niego to wtedy wygrywa Deatchmatch: to tryb w którym zabijamy przeciwników w tym trybie mamy automatycznie kupiony kevlar i każda broń jest za darmo ta osoba ktora zdobędzie najwięcej puntków to wygrywa Gra posiada oczywyście jeszcze skórki do broni które możemy sobie kupić je za realne pieniądze same skórki nie dawają nam nic tylko poprostu wygląd broni skiny kosztują od 0.03 centa aż nawet do 300 dollarów więc to jest poprostu biznes :) w grze możemy również otwierać skrzynki w których losowo wyleci nam skórka.Gra posiada system dropów co poziom dostaniemy skórke do naszej broni może to być od szarej jakości skina aż po różową. {"text": "Esse jogo é impressionante, falta palavras para expressar o quão a experiencia é incrível.", "appid": "960910", "steamid": "profiles/76561198086649454", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 0, "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1604491200.0}
{"text": "总体而言并不是非常推荐，但是从各方面可以看出制作组还是用了心思的，姑且还是给好评吧。 首先说说优点， 1.这个IP可以说是具备一定情怀的，天启四骑士的设定、末世的环境风格、厚重的主题色彩，本身就非常具有吸引力。 2.作为一款动作游戏，操作手感还是非常不错的，各种武器的招式动作和打击感都做得很不错。 3.相比于1代画质有所提升，整个游戏世界更大，场景变化也很多，探索性大幅提升。 4.与1代不同的是本作引入了刷刷刷要素，身上的装备分白绿蓝紫橙，从某种角度也提升了游戏的乐趣。 接下来就得说说缺点了，说实话我觉得这一作的缺点已经把优点都蚕食殆尽了。 1.首先，非常严重的问题，就是这个游戏经常会闪退。真的很频繁，配合这款游戏刷刷刷的体系，经常出现好不容易出了一把紫武，闪退了，再登游戏东西没了。可以说这个闪退的问题极大地影响了游戏体验，我甚至一度想要卸载。 2.尴尬的解密要素。作为一款ACT游戏，本作的解密要素实在太多了，主角甚至有几个技能是专门用于解密的，这种体验就像是鬼泣+波斯王子+三位一体+传送门的杂糅，有点不伦不类，使得一个非常爽快的游戏产生了割裂感。 3.BOSS战设计不尽人意。这款游戏的BOSS战还是非常多的，但是BOSS的一些设定使得主角的许多技能基本属于废物，BOSS的几个阶段也基本属于套路的重复，等于一定要按照BOSS的套路来，整个BOSS战容易使人产生厌烦感。 4.主角技能设定不平衡，主角可学的有延展属性的技能有6个，没有延展属性的有2个。基本一周目只能学一个满延展技能和两个无延展技能，但是技能之间的平衡性太差。因为洗点的成本很低，这次我也尝试了许多个技能，其中的召唤小弟的技能要明显优于其它技能。由于人物的灵活度远不如但丁贝姐，稍显有点笨拙，导致许多技能的运用还不如轻重击的体验。", "appid": "388410", "steamid": "profiles/76561198314308638", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "3", "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1573300800.0}

{"text": "ez)xD", "appid": "570", "steamid": "profiles/76561198370757779", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": 0, "votes_funny": 0, "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1497960000.0}
{"text": "Depth to produkcja niezwykle interesująca, choć nieco uboga w zawartość. Morska rozgrywka nie tylko angażuje, ale potrafi nawet wywołać emocje niczym rasowy horror. Niezależny tytuł zespołu Digital Confectioners to gra sieciowa, pozbawiona jakiegokolwiek trybu dla jednego użytkownika. Nie mamy jednak do czynienia z tradycyjnym modelem rywalizacji wieloosobowej. Dwie strony konfliktu diametralnie się różnią, oferując zupełnie inne doświadczenie. Miejsce akcji to morskie głębiny. Czwórka nurków podąża za robotem wydobywającym cenne artefakty i chroni maszynę - oraz własną skórę - przed atakami dwóch rekinów. Gracz może wcielić się w poszukiwacza skarbów lub drapieżnika. Jako nurek obserwujemy otoczenie z perspektywy pierwszoosobowej. By przetrwać, polegamy na broni, pomocnych gadżetach i - rzecz jasna - na pozostałych członkach zespołu. Trzymanie się razem to absolutna podstawa. Oddalenie się od grupy jest gwarantowaną przepustka do paszczy rekina. Od początku każdej rundy możemy zbierać z dna skarby zamieniane w walutę. W dowolnym momencie kupujemy też różne elementy wyposażenia, choć otrzymujemy je dopiero po odrodzeniu się. Udostępnij:Facebook1TwitterWykop Autor: Mateusz Zdanowicz Data: 21/01/2015 Testowano na PC Depth to produkcja niezwykle interesująca, choć nieco uboga w zawartość. Morska rozgrywka nie tylko angażuje, ale potrafi nawet wywołać emocje niczym rasowy horror. Niezależny tytuł zespołu Digital Confectioners to gra sieciowa, pozbawiona jakiegokolwiek trybu dla jednego użytkownika. Nie mamy jednak do czynienia z tradycyjnym modelem rywalizacji wieloosobowej. Dwie strony konfliktu diametralnie się różnią, oferując zupełnie inne doświadczenie. Miejsce akcji to morskie głębiny. Czwórka nurków podąża za robotem wydobywającym cenne artefakty i chroni maszynę - oraz własną skórę - przed atakami dwóch rekinów. Gracz może wcielić się w poszukiwacza skarbów lub drapieżnika. Jako nurek obserwujemy otoczenie z perspektywy pierwszoosobowej. By przetrwać, polegamy na broni, pomocnych gadżetach i - rzecz jasna - na pozostałych członkach zespołu. Trzymanie się razem to absolutna podstawa. Oddalenie się od grupy jest gwarantowaną przepustka do paszczy rekina. Od początku każdej rundy możemy zbierać z dna skarby zamieniane w walutę. W dowolnym momencie kupujemy też różne elementy wyposażenia, choć otrzymujemy je dopiero po odrodzeniu się. Do dyspozycji nurków oddano między innymi pistolety i karabiny, lecz również sprzęt bardziej specjalistyczny - harpuny czy wyrzutnie siatek, które pomagają ograniczyć mobilność rekinów. Możemy nawet używać podwodnych min i materiałów wybuchowych. Trzeba tylko uważać, by siła rażenia nie zraniła sojuszników. Rozgrywka jest zajmująca i emocjonująca, a momentami można się nawet przestraszyć. Kiedy płyniemy powoli przez ciemną jaskinię i słyszymy tylko przyspieszone bicie serca nurka, odczuwamy ciężką atmosferę zagrożenia. Kiedy wcielamy się w rekina, gra oferuje zgoła odmienny rodzaj zabawy. Kamera umieszczona jest za drapieżnikiem, pływamy szybko i z dużą zwinnością. Naszym jedynym celem jest polowanie na nurków i niszczenie robota wydobywającego skarby. Możemy poczuć się jak prawdziwy łowca, choć szybko uświadamiamy sobie, że wcale nie jesteśmy niepokonanym potworem. Zgrany zespół ludzi może być prawdziwym utrapieniem. Niezbędne jest odpowiednie planowanie ataków z drugim rekinem, a także korzystanie z dodatkowych przejść i skrótów. Znajomość map jest konieczna, by wyprowadzać skuteczne i błyskawiczne ataki z zaskoczenia. Obecnie Depth oferuje trzy gatunki rekinów, które różnią się podstawowymi statystykami: szybkością, wytrzymałością i liczbą punktów zdrowia. W trakcie każdego meczu odblokowujemy też kolejne umiejętności, które pomagają nam w łowach - na przykład wzmocnienie łusek czy możliwość wykrywania podwodnych min. Jedyną bronią rekina są jego szczęki, choć z czasem poznajemy inne skuteczne taktyki prowadzące do zwycięstwa. Przeciw nurkom możemy nawet wykorzystać ich własne materiały wybuchowe, wystarczy przepłynąć obok bomb z maksymalną prędkością, by wysadziły w powietrze poszukiwaczy skarbów znajdujących się w pobliżu. Jedno z ulepszeń sprawia także, że możemy przecinać wrogów ostrymi płetwami. Udane polowanie stanowi nie lada satysfakcję. Przy okazji, grając rekinem uczymy się, jakich błędów nie popełniać jako nurek. Możemy też dokładnie poznać wszystkie pięć map. Od premiery gry w listopadzie twórcy wprowadzili tylko jeden dodatkowy rodzaj rozgrywki. W Polowaniu na Megalodona jeden gracz steruje wielkim rekinem i stara się pokonać nurków. Kto zabije potwora, sam odradza się jako drapieżnik. To po prostu bardziej krwawy odpowiednik zabawy w berka. Depth dostarcza mocnych wrażeń, pozwala poczuć się jak niebezpieczny łowca lub obiekt polowania. To miła odskocznia od bardziej tradycyjnych gier sieciowych. Szkoda tylko, że nie oferuje więcej zawartości.", "appid": "274940", "steamid": "profiles/76561198267586844", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "30", "votes_funny": "3", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1497009600.0}

{"text": "«Инди игры — это мусор, на который не стоит тратить свое время» Сказал как-то раз мой знакомый. Я очень рад, что могу опровергнуть такое заявление. И, пожалуй, хорошим примером станет This is the Police. Для меня данная игра стала отличным пополнением в коллекции отличных игр, когда я покупал ее, я ждал «симулятор» полицейского участка с примесью нуара на пару часов. Но в итоге получил, невероятно глубокую и интересную игру на 23 часа, да возможно геймплей тут не слишком сложный, от слова совсем, но игра не про геймплей как бы смешно это не звучало, а скорее про сюжет. Сюжет здесь действительно на высоте. Второстепенные персонажи хорошо прописаны они запоминаются, имеют личность, свои мотивы поступать так или иначе. За этим интересно наблюдать и конечно же принимать свои собственные решения, которые обязательно скажутся на сюжете и на развитии ситуации в городе. Это игра действительно настоящая драма для Джека, шефа полиции Фрибурга и вам непременно захочется прожить ее вмести с ним. Что касается остального, в игре так же присутствует красивая джазовая музыка, что поможет вам погрузится в этот нуарный хаос полицейской работы. Так что не теряйте время на раздумья стоит ли ее покупать или нет, определённо стоит! {"text": "Probablemente el mejor juego RPG de Steam y el más entretenido. Es complicado compararlo con el Fallout 3, ya que en muchos aspectos, éste lo supera, y en muchos otros se queda atrás. En el tema \"NPC\", el Fallout 3 está muy por delante, ya que cuenta con mucha más variedad de intercambio de palabras y acciones. En el tema facciones, el 3 está por delante. En Fallout 4, es una de las pocas cosas que no dejaron del todo bien. En el tema \"PERKS\", considero que Fallout 4 está muchísimo más por delante, ya que cuenta con una extensa y útil variedad. El combate está muchísimo más mejorado, al igual que los enemigos y \"personajes de compañía\". El tema de la historia es bastante homogéneo, los dos, tienen una historia muy extensa y entretenida en cada segundo que pasa. En mi opinión, lo compres al precio que lo compres, es muy merecido. Algo malo a destacar los DLC. Aunque traigan bastante contenido, son demasiado caros para lo que contienen. Aún así el juego se lleva un 8/10, super recomendado. TRAS TERMINAR EL JUEGO: Puedo decir que hasta la fecha es mi juego favorito, además éste mismo hizo que me introduja en la saga Fallout, que me parece a día de hoy la mejor saga de videojuegos de la historia. Juegos de este estilo tienen mucha disonancia ludonarrativa por ende, nos perdemos muchos detalles, pero aún así, la historia es buenísima, muy rejugable y tiene un montón de detalles increíbles. El valor del juego me parece hasta barato para el contenido que ofrece, aunque sigo en desacuerdo con el precio de los DLC, es recomendable comprarlos en oferta. {"text": "Лучшее дополнение, лучший сериал.  Уж не знаю надавили ли на разработчиков с условиями, но глава сделана на новом уровне.  Это самый атмосферный маньяк, который по антуражу может соперничать с Майклом. Да, телепорты и рывки уже есть в игре, ничего нового в плане механики нет, но эти путешествия по изнанке выглядят очень эффектно, анимация его пасти с зубами и того, как он вылезает из порталов сделаны великолепно. Даже такая мелочь как то, что он вопит после удара, а не вытирает свои лапы от крови - уже радует.  А новые уникальные звуки погони это что-то нереальное, это то, чего не хватает каждому маньяку. Игра за Демогоргона и против него стала совсем по-другому ощущаться.  Прекрасные Нэнси и Стив, их нарисовали максимально похожими, неужели Стив поделился секретом своих волос с разработчиками?  Крюки с крысами на новой карте, и новые, новые ворота! Ещё бы уникальные генераторы для карт завести, но это я уже совсем размечтался.  С перками как обычно, большинство ситуативных, которые редко кто будет использовать на постоянной основе, но всё же есть несколько занимательных.  У маньяка это \"Выброс\", но им в лучшем случае у вас получится взорвать 2 генератора и откатить их, но 8% это совсем мало, тот же \"Чертик из Табакерки\" будет полезнее.  У выживших получше, перков целых 6, есть из чего выбрать. \"Внутренная сила\" позволяет вылечиться, сломав тотем и отсидевшись в шкафчике - это хороший выбор, учитывая то, что тотем можно сломать заранее и быть наготове. Но опять же, тотемов ограниченное количество, и будет удачей, если получится хотя бы два раза за игру воспользоваться этим перком.  С навыком \"Фиксация можно быстрее передвигаться пешком и видеть свои следы. Теперь от маньяка можно утопать в другой конец карты, пока он ищет тебя возле генератора. И, надеюсь, выжившие станут чаще использовать перк \"Товарищество\", который останавливает таймер висящего на крюке, против кемперов это отличное решение.  Карта красивая и зрелищная, это настоящая лаборатория из сериала, но это всё хорошее, что о ней можно сказать. Она очень неудобная, как для выживших, так и для маньяка. Куча дверей, проходов, спусков, а тотемы уж пойди найди в этих лабиринтах, похожих на \"Лэри\".  Это не \"Гидеон\", который стал одной из топовых карт для мансов, благодаря сейфовым паллетам. Здесь карта больше заточена на умение прятаться и не попадаться на глаза маньяку.  Когда были первые сливы главы о том, что появится Демогоргон из сериала, я не поверил. Разработчики говорили о том, что никаких монстров не будет. Но вот, лицензия от Netflix и первый антропоморфный маньяк. Это очень здорово, что компания выросла до таких размеров, что может себе позволить заключать контракты подобного плана. Надеюсь, дальше будет только лучше.", "appid": "1135280", "steamid": "profiles/76561198046836548", "voted_up": true, "votes_up": "84", "votes_funny": "3", "early_access": false, "tstamp_created": 1568808000.0}

{"text": "chega com propostas interessantes em relação a seu jogo anterior,   e não pode ser visto como \"reciclagem\" à primeira instância. Para quem não conhece, esta saga se trata de derrotar seus inimigos usando artes-marciais com comandos simples, no geral apenas um clique, em um cenário de plataforma. Contudo, não basta sair apertando loucamente as teclas e esperar que eles sejam acertados, há duas barras sob seus pés que delimitam seu campo de ações. Não é necessário se mover já que os oponentes virão até você, basta ser ágil e pegar o tempo certo. Agora a saga possui um tutorial sólido e completo, mostrando os diversos tipos de inimigos que enfrentaremos, os tipos de armas e como elas influenciam no combate, e até mesmo mostra as arremessáveis que são lançadas contra nós. Estas armas arremessadas pelos oponentes já haviam sido usadas no título anterior, porém agora não as defendemos apenas, mas sim desviamos e as atiramos de volta. Digo isso pois elas podem influenciar muito no combate, em meio às lutas frenéticas elas podem passar despercebidas, fazendo a diferença no seu ritmo. Há uma diferença gritante no número de cenários disponíveis em relação ao primeiro jogo, que possuía 250 mapas e este mais de 600. A quantidade de níveis não foi a única coisa que me chamou a atenção, todo o contexto visual foi de certa forma alterado, mesmo que em mínimos detalhes. Para começar, neste título há um contraste muito mais forte entre o fundo do cenário e os inimigos que transitam por ele, o que era um defeito bem irritante na obra anterior. Haviam momentos em que não dava para diferenciá-los ao  , e em alta velocidade isso se torna um problema. Os combates agora se comunicam com a fase, durante as lutas caminhões e veículos transitam ao fundo em certos momentos.  As mecânicas de   foram mantidas, havendo um total de 25 habilidades e   para elas. Porém não são habilidades ativas por assim dizer, diferente do primeiro jogo, aqui elas são ativadas quando certos eventos são concluídos. Isso foi um pouco frustrante, já que as vezes usava poderes de congelamento em vão, sem atingir uma única alma. Há também as passivas que aumentam seu campo de ataque e incrementam a munição que pode ser usada. Apesar dos  , não vi distinção entre as   com e sem aprimoramento, pois pareciam tudo a mesma coisa. Uma das questões que mais me impressionaram é o fato de que   tenta acompanhar o ritmo do jogador a cada fase. Explicando de forma simples, se você vai muito mal numa missão por conta da alta velocidade, o próprio título tenta adequar a dificuldade, diminuindo a cadência. Da mesma forma se você vai muito bem em determinado mapa, ele irá aumentar a velocidade para a próxima. Isso é realmente incrível, um exemplo genial para mostrar como os jogos podem aprender conosco, se adaptar para que não fique algo massante e tente sempre prezar pelo conforto. O modo torneio foi mantido, porém agora com uma pegada a lá  , já que ele se baseia em subir uma torre na medida de seu avanço. O   para duas pessoas também foi implementado numa espécie de torneio, porém apenas um toma o controle por vez, podendo ser substituído a qualquer momento ou quando o atual morre. Ainda há outros modos de jogo, porém não posso deixar de mencionar o  , que é basicamente os modos citados com um gato preto na frente, atrapalhando a visão do que está acontecendo. Para ser sincero, é bem hilário. {"text": "\"If you thought all action games were the same...\" \"...Think again.\" - Half-Life Box. Absolute Poetry and the best way to describe the game.  Half-Life isn't your Brother's quake, it isn't your papa's Doom, and it surely isn't your granddad's Wolf 3d. Half-Life is something else. The enemies are dangerous, always present, and their tactics always change. You can't just go in and shotgun a marine, then move on. No, because you will waste a lot of ammo on one of them, and by the time they are down, about 3 others have probably dog-piled you. You need to use every one of your weapons to their full effect, and find creative uses for all of them, in order to not only kill your enemies, but to also flush them from cover and into your gunfire. They know how to use their weapons like professionals (Because they're mostly army grunts), and you are nothing but a lonely scientist. What are you going to do to fight them? Answer: Superior Intellect. Because of this, Half-Life is an incredibly unique and fun action FPS which is doubtlessly timeless. While many prefer HL2, I will always have a soft spot for Half-life. And hey, if you are reading this review, then you can thank Half-Life for putting Valve on the map, and subsequently making Steam. So, there's that! Half-Life is daunting, challenging, and tough as hell. But remember: Run. Shoot. Think. Live. Hλlf-Life gets a solid 8.9/10 from me.
